item.title: My Npcs Wont talk

item.description:
@Sha_Owned wrote:

so this is what i have in NPC handler after you search for moo

npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Moo”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 425) {

}
